sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Hospital Uninsured Patient Discount Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Hospital Uninsured Patient Discount Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Home rule. A home rule unit may not regulate hospitals in a manner inconsistent with the provisions of this Act
sections.text: This Section is a limitation under subsection (i) of Section 6 of Article VII of the Illinois Constitution on the concurrent exercise by home rule units of powers and functions exercised

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law, except that Sections 1 through 30 take effect 90 days after becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law, except that Sections 1 through 30 take effect 90 days after becoming law.
